driver.expression_desc_text: Designed for use in mosaic analyses; used to drive gene of interest in @Scer\FLP1@-generated clones. Transiently generated during mosaic analyses; ubiquitous expression throughout region of the generated clone, but not in rest of body (cell autonomous). Stocks for mosaic analysis are attached to progenitor construct @P{AyGAL4}@; see @Scer\GAL4[FRT.Act5C]@ elsewhere in this table. Stocks in which the descendent construct has been stably incorporated are associated with this allele; ubiquitous embryonic expression is driven.
driver.name: Scer\GAL4<up>Act5C.PI</up>

driver.expression_desc_text: Designed for use in mosaic analyses; used to drive gene of interest in @Scer\FLP1@-generated clones. Transiently generated during mosaic analyses; ubiquitous expression throughout region of the generated clone, but not in rest of body (cell autonomous). Stocks are attached to progenitor construct @P{GAL4-Act5C(FRT.CD2).P}@; see @Scer\GAL4[FRT.Rnor\Cd2.Act5C]@ elsewhere in this table.

driver.expression_desc_text: Drives expression in the posterior medial protocerebrum (PMP), the AMP (anterior medial protocerebrum) and the ALP (anterior lateral protocerebrum). Drives expression in several identified neurons, including the adult serotonergic LP2, SE1, and SE3 neurons, and the FMRFamide SE2 neuron.

driver.expression_desc_text: Drives expression in the wing disc in a wide band in the center of the wing pouch, aligned with the A/P axis, in the wing hinge primordium, and in the alula anlage. In the eye disc, drives expression at the dorsal and ventral margins of the main epithelium, and in the retinal basal glia. In the leg discs, drives expression in an anterior stripe in the dorsal compartment, overlapping the region of @dpp@ expression. Drives a wedge-shaped region of expression along the ventral margin of the antenna disc. Drives expression at the segment boundaries of the abdominal tergites during pupal stages.
